title: MasterChef
overview: The world's most successful cooking casting show is back: with a green concept and a new juror. In addition to the TV and star chefs Ralf Zacherl and Nelson Müller, top chef Maria Groß supports the prominent jury. In addition, the entire production was shot sustainably and according to the criteria of the Green Shooting Pass of the Hamburg Schleswig Holstein Film Commission.And Zacherl, Müller and Groß are once again looking for the best amateur chef in Germany from among hundreds of candidates. The aspiring "MasterChefs" can once again look forward to an exciting journey with lots of challenging tasks, both in the "MasterChef" studio kitchen and in extensive outdoor filming throughout Germany and other European countries. The winner receives 50,000 euros, the "MasterChef" trophy and a prominent publication in "Lust auf Genuss", Germany's leading premium food magazine.
